scripts.check-env: node -e "console.log('Checking environment variables...'); const required = ['ELEVENLABS_API_KEY', 'GEMINI_API_KEY']; let missing = []; required.forEach(key => { if (!process.env[key]) missing.push(key); }); if (missing.length > 0) { console.error('Missing required environment variables:', missing.join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('âœ“ All required environment variables are set'); }"
